room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Key Quest in Spokane
review: So much fun! I am 51 years old and we went for my 11 year old grandsons birthday...it also happened to be our 33rd wedding anniversary. We had so much fun...I think it's going to be our annual anniversary visit from here on out.

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Key Quest in Spokane
review: The staff is very friendly and helpful. It was a great birthday party. I definitely recommend this place for birthday parties! EVERYONE that came had a great time!!

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Key Quest in Spokane
review: Just had my daughters 10th birthday tonight. The staff was absolutely incredible and the kids had a blast.
